title: Evil Dead
review: This is the third time we've been told this same story. We've had it with some jokes, then with lots of jokes, and now with no jokes. Why did they do this? I don't know. Is it boring for people who know what is going to happen the whole time? Yes. I don't dislike it, but I would never recommend it when you could watch {Evil Dead II} instead and have so much more fun. This reboot really lacks personality and quirkiness in comparison. I particularly didn't like the attempt at emotional impact towards the end, but the rest of the last act was fun. It is extremely violent, but I can't give it a perfect grotesque score when there is so much obvious CGI. It just doesn't feel as horrible when it looks so fake.
